        public boolean addListener​(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> listener,
                           java.lang.String... propertyNames)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject
        Adding a listener either to all events or to one or more property names.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface RemoteCafeServer
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be added
        propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be added as a lister for all events.
        Returns:
        true if the listener has been added. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been added to at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been added to all listed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - when something goes wrong e.g. in connection, sending or receiving
